description.value: As silicon-based creatures, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.0m7liVAP6VTXzqOF]{quorlus’} internal anatomy differs greatly from that of most carbon-based life-forms. This augmentation reinforces parts of your heart and lungs (or similar vital organs) with silicon plates and nets, making you immune to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.gBhZDjh30JEyh7DY]{disease} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{poison}. However, you can never benefit from @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Drugs}, medicinals, or similar nonmagical substances. You also gain a +2 enhancement bonus to saving throws against @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.v9RNVTqyTyaPchvd]{Bleed} effects. You don’t need to breathe and you don’t suffer the normal effects of being in a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.BWuAh3NeW0Dcnjon#vacuum]{vacuum}.

modifiers.name: Lithic Graft
modifiers.notes: You also gain a +2 enhancement bonus to saving throws against bleed effects.
